p: The presence of metals in the environment represents a concern for the safety of the food and implicitly for human life. In natural systems, heavy metals come from rocks, ores, volcanoes, and from the release of metals during the weather that leads to soil formation [ 1]. A very acute problem occurs when the heavy metals concentration increases significantly in certain ecosystems due to anthropogenic activities [ 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7].
